CSS.description: Fixed desktop mode being cut off in Wix iframe
details: Replaced global `html { overflow: hidden; }` with `html, body { width:100%; height:auto; min-height:100%; overflow-x:hidden; }`
Added `body { overflow-y:auto; -webkit-text-size-adjust:100%; }`
Kept `body.remote-mode { overflow:hidden !important; }`
Removed duplicate overflow rules in @media (max-width: 768px) block

CSS.description: Remote mode fills full mobile screen using visualViewport
details: #remoteHub uses `height: var(--rh-vh, 100svh)`
iframe-mode uses `min-height: var(--rh-vh, 100vh)` and `height: var(--rh-vh, 100vh)`
JS sets --rh-vh via visualViewport API on load/resize/orientation

CSS.description: Tighter remote masthead logo + wordmark alignment
details: .rh-logo-link gap: 4px (desktop), 3px (mobile)
.rh-logo opacity:1, no animation delay - immediate visibility
Added .rh-wordmark-block, .rh-wordmark, .rh-wordmark-est classes
MarketWatch! in Cormorant Garant 16px, HIRECAR LLC Est. Nov 2024 in DM Mono 7px
Wordmark sits exactly below logo with line-height:1

Headline text: 'Your credit took a hit.
We bring it back.'

All input, checkbox, button, and error state styles

Phase 2: #rhLeadModal with first name, mobile, TOS checkbox, SMS policy, remember checkbox, Start Now button, instruction text

HTML.description: Replaced emoji placeholder with dynamic hero image container
details: #desktopHeroWrap with #desktopHeroSlide for background-image rotation

JS.description: Per-city hero image sets with time-of-day logic
details: CITY_HERO_CONFIG object with day/night arrays for los-angeles, las-vegas, san-francisco
6 images per city per time period: sweeping city, supercar, road trip, freeway, culture, scenic
applyDesktopHero(cityKey) rotates images every 6s
Vegas images use background-position: center 42% for proper centering on mobile
States: idle -> leadModal -> loadingOverlay -> pushToStart -> heroRevealed
rhHasLeadData() checks localStorage for remembered lead
rhShowLeadModal() -> rhSubmitLead() validates name + TOS
rhShowLoadingOverlay() runs 2.2s logo glitch animation
Remember checkbox saves lead data to localStorage
Switching to desktop clears all entry UI states

JS.description: Real viewport height for remote mode
details: rhSetVh() uses visualViewport.height when available
Sets CSS var --rh-vh on documentElement
Bound to: load, resize, visualViewport.resize, orientationchange

JS.description: CTA-driven Top Stories content switching (data structure ready)
details: STORIES_VARIANTS object with read/info/reserve/purchase variants
Each variant has headline, subtext, and 3 news card data objects
Ready for UI binding in remote hub CTA handlers
Desktop mode: restores body scroll, clears remote UI states
Remote mode: calls rhSetVh(), triggers entry sequence after 100ms
